mapper.select: select * from search where pum_name = #{pumName} and sale_date = DATE(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 DAY))
mapper.insert: insert into search(avg_amt, flower_gubn, good_name, lv, max_amt, min_amt, pum_name, sale_date) values (#{avgAmt}, #{flowerGubn}, #{goodName}, #{lv}, #{maxAmt}, #{minAmt}, #{pumName}, #{saleDate})
